abstract.para: This reference guide is for developers, administrators, and even beginners who use eXo Platform. After reading this guide, you wil gain a comprehensive knowledge of eXo JCR - a powerful open source implementation of the Java Specification Request 170, also known as Content Repository for Java technology API.
The guide is divided into the following chapters:

listitem.para: This chapter walks you through basic knowledge of JCR. You will also learn about the JCR architecture and its compatibility levels.
This chapter covers instructions on how to configure and use JCR from basic to advanced levels.
This chapter is a collection of references which are useful for developers, including JCR node types, namespaces, searches, services and extensions.
This chapter takes you through instructions on how to configure JCR connectors, database, administration tools and performance tuning.
